column2: Hub Group, Inc. engages in the provision of multi-modal transportation and logistics solutions. The company is headquartered in Oak Brook, Illinois and currently employs 5,400 full-time employees. The firm offers intermodal, truck brokerage and logistics services. The company operates through its Hub segment. Its segment provides intermodal, truck brokerage and logistics services through a network of operating centers throughout the United States, Canada and Mexico. The Hub segment services customers in a range of industries, including consumer products, retail and durable goods. The company operates through a network of operating centers and independent business owners. The firm also provides drayage services with its own drayage operations.
